page.title: 17PLAYGROUND GAMES (2)
page.content: Twenty four robbers came knocking at the door I let them in and this is what they said to me Spanish lady turn around Spanish lady touch the ground Spanish lady do high kicks Spanish lady do the splits, Low, High, Dolly, Pepper, Medium choice. HERE IS A CLAPPING GAME PLAYED IN PARIS. THE CHILDREN STAND FACING EACH OTHER AND PERFORM A FAST CLAPPING PATTERN. IT IS INTERESTING TO NOTE THAT THE PUNCTUATION MARKS APPEAR HERE. I'm Popeye the sailor man, full stop. I live in a caravan, full stop. When I go swimming I kiss all the women I'Popeye the sailor man. Christine Godwin.
